issues.description: The problem statement specifies that the helper method `singFarmSongVerse(Animal animal)` should be declared as `public` for easier testing, but in the template (`Farm.java` line 18) and in the reference solution (`Farm.java` line 33) it is declared `private`. This visibility mismatch could prevent tests from accessing the method and confuse students.
issues.suggested_fix: Change the visibility of `singFarmSongVerse(Animal animal)` from `private` to `public` in `Farm.java` (both in the template and the solution) to match the problem specification.
